author: Robin Marx
description:
Issue #6 of The Savage Sword of Conan features the conclusion of the lengthy King Conan comic “The Ensorcelled,” a short Conan story by Matthew John, and a new self-contained comic starring Dark Agnes de Chastillon. Once again penned by Jason Aaron and illustrated by Geof Isherwood, the second half of “The Ensorcelled” takes up […]

The post REVIEW: The Savage Sword of Conan #6 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Savage Sword of Conan #6
